doc:
Billy B. Van https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_B._Van 0 Billy B. Van (August 3, 1870 – November 16, 1950) was a prominent entertainer in the early decades of the 1900s. He was a star, progressively, in minstrel shows, vaudeville, burlesque, the New York stage, and movies. At the same time under another name he was a well-known dairy farmer and agriculturist. And, at the same time he was a manufacturer of soap products. And later in his career he reinvented himself as a nationally known motivational speaker, and a Yankee goodwill ambassador. Billy_B._Van ( August_3_,_1870 – November_16_,_1950 ) was a_prominent_entertainer in the_early_decades of the_1900s . He was a_star , progressively , in minstrel_shows , vaudeville , burlesque , the_New_York_stage , and movies . At the_same_time under another_name he was a_well-known_dairy_farmer_and_agriculturist . And , at the_same_time he was a_manufacturer of soap_products . And later in his_career he reinvented himself as a_nationally_known_motivational_speaker , and a_Yankee_goodwill_ambassador .
